RICK.raw_line: Can you imagine it, Regis, Kathie Lee? One day I'm a hot young movie star, and the next day I'm a hideous mutant freak, covered with festering lesions.Well, it's kinda long, but okay. It all started when I signed a deal to be spokesman for the E.E.S. conglomerate...So, what kind of crap do you scumbags want me to peddle?Fertilizer? Ricky Coogan does not do ads for hi-tech cow shit. I'm a star, got it, Hertz? Rico, give these misguided clowns Tony Danza's phone number, and let's get the hell out of here.Noxon? Wasn't that just banned?But I heard that shit's lethal.Santa "Flan?" What kind of shitty name for a country is that?Wait a second--Look, it sounds great, but--Uh-huh. Where the fuck is Ernie?IT'S THE ERNIE! WOOF! WOOF! WOOF!Yeah, why?Leave me alone, troll! That was before I got an entertainment lawyer.Don't cry, Stuey, I'm still good.ALRIGHT!In the bag.AHHHHHHH!You gonna eat your peanuts, Ernie?Here we are Ernie, Santa Spam. World famous for loud music and hot sex!Give me a few hours.Sure glad that wasn't our plane.Wait a second...Forget them. I got a better idea. If I can just find the right disguise...Hey, how'd you like to make a quick hundred bucks?Here.Help! Ow! Give me back my crutches! You monster! Oh, the pain! The agony!Thanks. Don't worry about me. What's one man's pain weighed against the global injustice of corporate tyrants like EES? Go. The fight must continue.Josh. Josh Tavner.Same here! You could ride with us.Oh, he's okay. Have you ever heard of an idiot savant?That's Ernie. Except for the savant part.Ooooh, my pelvis.Well, he's got a few problems.Well, with a script that bad, Coogan deserves an Oscar for coming off as good as he did! I mean, that's what I read.SLATER!? I could act circles around that one-note hack! He was shittin' his diapers when I was the toast of Broadway! I made grown men cry! I made crippled children laugh! Now all I ever hear is Slater! Slater! Slater! WELL SLATER CAN KISS MY ASS! YOU HEAR ME?You think Slater could improv like this? Make you believe he was an invalid!? Huh!?Human worm...Dog boy...Hideous frog man.Kind of like a family reunion for you, huh?Real stupid. Let's go. This place is dead.Nah, you seem like a regular dumbshit old redneck to me.Drop dead.We're deeply honored. But no thanks.And to think we could be in the limo with those stewardesses.ARE YOU OUT OF YOUR MIND!?Hey! You're not supposed to have that stuff!Let me go, Skuggs, or else!Yeah, that's me!AAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHRRRRGGGGGGG!Huh?AAaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaargh!Oh God! This was my good side!Great use of the space.Ernie? Julie?I know that voice. That's the voice that said, "Cool, a freak show. Let's check it out!""It's so real." Is this real enough for you? I'm friggin' Quasimodo!Okay, here I come.Yeah, well, you're no Mona Lisas yourself. You're lucky I've got a strong stomach!Get away from me you, you...No thanks. I don't plan on staying long. How many of you are there in here anyway?Huh?This is nuts. This is crazy... Besides, it was Tatum O'Neill.Get away from me. Get away! I'm not like you. You hear me? I'm Ricky Coogan! I AM NOT A FREAK!It was your fault, anyway. You wanted to see the freak show.Ernie!"So You're a Hideous Mutant Freak-- Now What?"Forget it. Not me. I'm not like those other god-forsaken animals.Yeah. Says you.You're right.Well that EES guy should rescue me any minute. Then it's straight to the plastic surgeon and back to sunny old L.A. I wonder how many of my beautiful, anatomically correct girlfriends will be waiting for me.Thanks, Stuey.AHH! A phantom troll!No.In your dreams! Now get lost, troll!Arrrggg. I am Beast Boy. I will eat you. Arrrghh. (he throws down theDamn it! What's keeping those guys?Well, let's see. I've been kidnapped, hideously disfigured, imprisoned with a bunch of mutant freaks, my rescue party is M.I.A., and this dialogue makes "Hey Dude Three" read like "Dr. Zhivago."So?I'll be right there. Thank you Worm. I don't really know how I can repay you for this.Ha-ha! Always the wit, eh Worm?Now is the winter of our discontent, Made glorious summer by this son of York, But I that am not shaped for sportive tricks, Nor made to court an amorous looking glass, I, that am curtailed of this fair proportion, Cheated of feature by dissembling nature,Deformed, unfinished, sent before my time,I'm saved! Haha! You sorry mutants are gonna rot in this hole while I'm sipping mint juleps by the pool! {AS FORTUNE SMILES O'ER MY FATE, SO DESTINY SPURNS YOUR ACCURSE'D PATE}I mean, um, I hope you have room for all my friends, heh-heh.What are you saying!?EAT SHIT!Hey. The Wheel. Mind if I sit in?Look! I'm sorry for what happened at the show. Can't you just forget it?You have an escape plan?What's the matter with all of you? You trust your lives to a guy just 'cause he can lick his own privates?Fine! I'll just come up with an escape plan of my own then.I will!Forget it! I don't need you, EES, or anybody else! I'll get out of here all by myself, you... you.,. crud sucking pus monkeys!Damn.Psst! Hey, you. Milkman!Just the man I'm lookinq for. Be a pal, and give me a hand will ya?Okay. Guess I'll just have to milk the world's biggest breasted woman all by myself. Sorry to bother you.(in a lusty womanishShit.Damn! This guy doesn't trust anybody!AHHHH!No thanks.Well, okay. (he scoops some into hisBut I thought I scared everyone away.Yeah, but she loves everything.Look Skuggs--Elijah--I've been in show business all my life. The public does not want to see disgusting, depraved violent filth.This is your big plan? A dozen milkmen? Isn't that a little unusual?Fine then. Go ahead. Hope you like reggae, ya flea bitten bastard.Ah, shit.Look, you'll all be killed. You don't know about Elijah's giant Rasta eyeballs with machine guns... It's suicide! I can't let you do it.You know how men are. Besides, it was a pretty good looking squirrel.Julie, compared to this, sex with Julia Roberts was a thankless chore.The Laughing Man!Holy shit!Read this. I grabbed it from Skuggs' office.After that.Elijah's up to something big, and we have to stop him.Mmmm. Jasmine.Alright guys, listen up--I haven't said anything yet.Tomorrow night, at the show, I'll be turned into a homicidal monster and forced to kill you all. But we might have a chance if we act fast. And I'm prepared to be your new leader.And I've got a plan.If we can get into Elijah's lab, maybe we can--Oh. Well--Um, maybe--Oh. Oh yeah. Well, see, what I was going to say was--Right. Well, what about--Well, actually, I was going to suggest we send away for sea monkeys, train them to fire guns, and make a break for it. But if you want to go with this other thing, I guess that's okay.Hey, look at this!It's Old Faithful! (foriegn take: "It's the Blarney Stone!"]C'mon Ernie, let's go.Hurry!Scrappy!It's been ten years since you chased this ball into the sewer! I thought you were gone for good!Listen Scrap. Go home. Get help. Understand?Good boy! Now go!You never know.Keep your voice down, Ernie.Oh.... Right.You did it, Worm! Way to go!Here, hold this.Thanks. Look, I've been a freak all my life.' I realize that now. Up there on that screen, humiliating myself for every fool with six bucks in his pocket--Alright. It doesn't matter.Look, I'm talking about the ultimate human sacrifice.Hey! In case you haven't noticed, I'm about to commit a noble and selfless act here.Oops. Okay. Let's do what we came to do, and this time, no more screw ups.No. Here goes.We have to wait. There's no way to speed up the machine.It's plugged up!You go ahead. I'll catch up.Go!Paul saved our lives!This is no time to lament over a cadaver! We've got to get moving, or we're history! Now c'mon!I said enough! Okay, listen up, everybody. We cracked the code and made the ointment we need to bring Skuggs down for good.But we left it in the lab.But wait! I found some macaroons! And there's plenty for all of us!I don't believe it. What's Hertz doin' here?So EES is in bed with Elijah C. Skuggs, eh? Figures.Cut the crap, Hertz.Really?AAARRGGGGHH!Holy shit.Oh no, not now, Stuey!Hey. That's Elijah's lab! Stuey! Are you really in the lab?Stuey! Stuey, can you hear me?I want you to try and escape. Get the cup from underneath the instrument table and bring it to me, okay?Yeah, right. Get movin'.Take the tape off your mouth, idiot! They didn't tie your hands!Great! There's no time to waste. Are you being followed?What a geek.Stuey got caught. There's no way to get the ointment before the show.No. It won't be me. It's some inhuman monster Elijah used me to create. As for me, the real me, I'll always be your friend. Before I have to rip your heads off, I'd like to say goodbye to each of you. Worm... I'll miss your brains, the smell of your pipe, and the funny way you always go on talking until everyone wants to strangle you.Cowboy, I'll miss your good humor, your down-home wisdom, and of course, the frothy milkshakes were udderly delicious, heh-heh...Bearded... Lady... I dunno. We'll always have Paris...Nosey, I never really liked you.Frog Man, I think death is probably the best thing for you now.Ernie... Julie... I have mixed feelings. On one hand, I'll remember you as the best friend a jerk like me ever had, and a low down repulsive slimeball.On the other hand, I really respect you, and more than that, I, uh, well, I wish we'd had the chance to boink.Today I make the proudest boast a man can utter: "Ich bien ein Freak!"Uh, I'm a freak.Stuey! Where are you?!Oh no!Nahh.Wait! Wait! (Elijah pauses. RickAHHHHRRRGGG!And then...Sorry.Well, let's see, the other freaks were lined up in Elijah's sights, and I was about to shove a pipe through Stuey's skull, when all of a sudden, I heard a voice...Raarrrrrrgh!Maybe you'll feel this ...What antidote?If you ask me, you skimped on the coconut!Scrappy!Atta boy, Scrap!Great. But how did you--No! It can't be!Exactly like you two, I swear. Same faces, same outfits, except they had these really big, hideous feet...Yes... Yes it is.Stuey!Thank God. You know, this adventure has taught me something.When man starts impinging on the subtle perfection of the earth's natural order, the only thing he'll create is havoc.

ERNIE.raw_line: Ladies! All I wanted was a manicure! Yah-ha-ha! IT'S THE COOG!Quick, down here.Nah, you can have 'em.It is?Jesus! We better find the limo before these whale kissers chop us up and sell us for parts. There it is.Let's go, Rick. They're waitin'.Coog, those hippies'll tear us apart.He says the pants don't usually come off for less than two-fifty, but since you're so cute, he'll make an exception.Mother Theresa. Glad to meet you.Ow! Hey!Hey Julie. You know I'm kind of an idea man myself. Like, let's say there's a nuclear war, and the only two people left are you and the Pope... Would you pork him?But one thing's for sure. That Coogan guy sure is an asshole, huh?So, do you like Swedish films?Lighten up, Coog, could be a goof.Yeah. Where are all the weirdos?Hey! What the--Yeah. We really must be--What the heck. We'll see some pickled dog brains, maybe some pictures of women with, you know, added equipment.What the hell, Coog, these people are weird, but they seem nice enough.Ladies first!If I were you, I would!Wait a second. You're really gonna smear that stuff on us and mutate our body parts!?Well... then could you give me a really big rodney?Well, at least I'll never have to go far for a piece of tail.Ouch! I was just trying to keep things light. Oh God! Why me!?Over here, Coog.Chill out, Coog. You're talking to the original tag team of ugly pukes. Step into the light.ULP!Call me old-fashioned, but I'll go with Paul Lynde.Okay Coog, so I get twenty four hour access to T `n' A, and you look like a plate of rancid giblets. We're still pals, right?Oh... Sorry, Coog. For a second there, I was a total man-hater. Weird.Sorry.Hey Julie, how many feminists does it take to screw in a light bulb?Two. One to screw it in and one to ride my Rodney! Ha-ha-ha!Hey, shouldn't you tell Rick about your big escape plan?Well, excuse me for living.You gotta admit, Coog, it's a helluva trick.Yeah. Don't go off half-cocked. Believe me, it ain't all it's cracked up to be.I'm getting a bad feeling here.God, I can't believe he left you for a squirrel. What a dick.Not again. Oh well, at least we'll get to try a new position.I'll say! Almost punctured a kidney!It says it's strong enough for a man!Beaver World!?But you need Noxon 24 to make the freaking sludge, and Elijah told us himself he's run out of it.It's my Aunt Gladys!And that's me at my bar mitzvah!Wait, you gotta see the ones from sleep-away camp! They're hilarious!Hey! Do you hear that?Shit. I can't see a damn thing.Don't push me, Coog. I got a real short fuse today. I'm cranky, bloated, got a wicked case of cramps. Don't ask why.Hey! It's working!If it does work, do you think there'll be enough left over to give me a monster size rodney?Seven bucks.Sure it does. They don't let you into the theater if you don't pay the price of the ticket.Somebody's comin'! Hurry.If it's your damn pudding, I'll ring your wormy neck.No way! The skull cracker is an illegal move!Atta' boy Coog! Hey, ain't that somethin'?Oh, like that wasn't totally predictable.Right, Coog. I learned somethin' too. That men and women truly are equals. That the human spirit transcends gender and physical appearance, and thus it is immune to the petty degradations men may devise. I believe it was Moliere WHO SAID--

STUEY.raw_line: Rick! Rick! Look! I got a rare still from your high school production of The Glass Menagerie! Could you sign it for me? Please?!Rick! Wait up!Rick! Remember the speech you gave at the Actors Forum for Social Justice!?Rick! Rick! It says here Noxon's dangerous. Why are you lending your name to it? What's happened to you, Rick? You used to be good! And now... I just don't know...AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH...Hey, I'm okay!OW!Wow! I'm Ricky Coogan's soulmate!Wait'll I tell the kids at school!Once America sees what happened to Ricky, they'll probably send the whole FBI down to save him!I'll probably win a Pulitzer prize for this scoop. And I'll dedicate it to Rick!That's okay. I know the way."Freaky Deaky! Ricky Coogan's a mutant in South America! By Stuart S. Gluck." That's me!Sure I wrote the article. But--No. You've got it all wrong. I don't know anything about that. You gotta believe me.AHHHHH! STOP IT! OOOWWWWW!No way. I'll never talk! I'm made of stone!HELP! RICK! RIIIIIIIIIICCKKK!Rick! Riiiicccck!Rick? Is that you?Well you're no Julio Iglesias yourself, mister. Rick! Riiiick! Riii----iiiiiick!Yes! I'm in the lab! I'm in the lab!Mmm hmmm!Mmmm mmmmm!Mmm! Mmmmm!I got the cup, Rick!Yeah. But if I don't move, they won't see me.Riiiick!Rick! Over here!Here I am, Rick!AAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!Rick! Rick!Look! I found the real Regis and Kathie Lee!No, this is just my lunch!This is Regis and Kathie Lee.

JULIE.raw_line: Are you okay? Let me help you!Wow... My name's Julie.Give me those, ape. Help him up.Hey Josh, a busload of us are headed over to Maracas to protest Noxon 24 and pelt Ricky Coogan with cow shit.Us? You're with him?Sure.Is this better?I'll say! What a total piece of shit. Don't you think so, Josh?And what a lousy actor! I mean can you believe that "Hey Dude" crap?Well, he's no Christian Slater.You don't even want to hear the truth about Noxon, do you, Coogan?I mean, look, I'm not saying this stuff is going to turn anyone into a... a...Right. A human worm. I mean, that's just stupid. The point is--Yeah, or a dog boy. That's absurd. BUT--Okay, okay. Now you're just being silly. Human suffering's just a big joke to you, huh? You are sick, Coogan!Cool! A freak show! Let's check it out!Isn't it great? It's so "real"...I'm Julie. And you are...We'd like to see your freak show. You see, only by appreciating the variety and innovation of nature can we come to respect the fragile complexity of our global eco- system.Eeuuuwww... (composes herself andOh, just our luck...The sideshow tradition has been misrepresented by the media. You don't traffic in human misery. You show society the part of itself it doesn't want to look at.My God! He's using Noxon Twenty- Four!Wait a minute. Does this mean we're not going to see a show?Go screw yourself!NOOOOO!Pig!Mother always said there'd be days like this. And I thought she was nuts!Are you alright?What!? Oh sure, blame the woman. Typical.Oh geez... It's not so revolting. After all, physical beauty is just a socially-enforced myth that we, uh, oh shit... ULPIKind of the "top dog."Don't be an idiot.All the freaks have gone through this anguish, Rick. At first, I was blinded by my anger. I admit it. I wanted to break your neck for getting me into this. But I got over it. Juan taught me to channel my anger for the common good.I THOUGHT I TOLD YOU TO SHUT UP!Here. Take it.we're in cubicle eight. Maybe later you'll be ready to talk.How many?Oaf!Juan's plan is really ingenious Rick. See, he figured out that--Rick, wait.This isn't one of your dumb movies, Coogan. Look, Juan's a good dog, a smart dog. I'll talk to him. Don't be stupid, Rick. You can't do it without us.Come on. You heard the Beast Boy. Back to the Freak House, now.Oh Rick, you've touched a place in me no one has ever touched before.But it's made for a woman!Hey Rick. What's up?"Tape Donahue... Renew Subscription to Beaver World..." Eeuw!"Prepare demonstration for Laughing Man, receive five thousand barrels of Noxon." Five thousand barrels!?Yes! Exactly! If they've been using Noxon 24 as a fertilizer here, the entire ecosystem must be soaked with it! All we need is a way to extract it from the vegetation, ideally into a liquid form.Good thinking, Rick.Wow!Stooge!I hate when you do that.It's a dog!Look, a wood floor.PMS...But how? You didn't even use the Noxon.Hang on, Rick. Do you really think we should put this toxic glop on you? What if it doesn't work? What if something goes wrong? What IF--Sometimes seven fifty.No kidding. When you consider money for parking, popcorn, drinks...Here it comes.BUT--Rick! Come on!Oh, Rick...Rick! It's finally over!Well, now it really is over.Oh, shut up. Let's go fuck.

ELIJAH.raw_line: Mutants, yes. Genetic nightmares, definitely. Children of Hell and twisted masses of living, breathing tormented flesh, certainly. But as for weirdos... not a one. Unless of course you count me! Ha ha ha!Elijah C. Skuggs, proud proprietor of Skugg's Fabulous Freak Land and Mutant Emporium. But you knew that. After all, you've ventured miles away from civilization, hospitals, telephones, police... How may I help-you?And you come to me looking for weirdos?Mr. Toad is my... assistant. As for the show, I'm afraid the next parade of deformity isn't until tomorrow night...However! I do have a private exhibit in my shed you might enjoy. I don't usually share it with the general public...Yes... Yesm I see...HA-HE-HE-HE! God I love the Family Circus! How do they do it day after day? It's amazing.Well, I guess they do use the same joke over and over. I'm just a sucker for that little moffet's shenanigans, that's all. (he tosses the funniesBehold! The Tasty Freekz machine!Oh? Well, I guess I'm not supposed to have these either!I need only punch a few buttons on this magnificent device, and it gives me an easy-to-apply ointment that will mutate a perfect young body, bubble its skin, warp its bones and twist its guts into ANToad, fire up that machine, and let's turn these hapless asswipes into monstrosities!Now let's see. Who wants to get freaked first?Hmmmm.It's like Yin and Yang... AC/DC... two birds with one stone... Yeah, it's pretty darn good, really...Let 'er rip, Toad!Correct.I'm a mad scientist pal, not a miracle worker.Gumby! Put that thing away!Feast your eyes!A mere party trick. But you, you're gonna be special.You know her?Ah, screw it. I'd never get anywhere with her. TOAD! FIRE UP THAT INFERNAL YOGURT MACHINE!For years I've strived to create the ultimate monster. The first of a whole new generation of superfreaks! Now I've finally got you, the perfect subject--a real asshole! HA-HA- Wait a minute. Aren't you the guy from "Hey Dude Three-The Beguiling?"You were great in that picture! Oh well, I guess for the next one they'll have to get Christian Slater! HA-HA-HA!This is Red Swan. May I speak to the Laughing Man?... Yes, I'll hold.Laughing Man? Red Swan. I've done it! I found the perfect subject-- huge ego, shallow personality, almost no moral values... A lawyer? No, better. An actor. Yeah, the guy from those hilarious "Hey Dude" movies! Hahahaha--Well, I liked 'em.Right... Yes... Yes, I see... But that's just it. He's not quite, uh, finished. I need more Noxon so I can--Geez, what a grouch.Laughing Man? I have to go. What about the Noxon? Two days? Great, you can see everything then... Yeah, you take it easy too.Wakey, wakey. Time to meet and greet the new you.Still is if you ask me! Hell, even half-done, you'll be the star of the show tonight.Welcome to your spacious accommodations.I learned it all from Bob Vila.Give it a rest, Bob!One of these days I gotta put a shitter in there.Alright, freaks! Get ready for the glamour! Get ready for the glitz! Get ready to be pelted with rotten vegetables, 'cause it's showtime!It's grisly! It's revolting! It'll make you wish you were dead! And at just twelve bucks a head, you can bring all the kids!Quiet, please.Thank you. Ladies and gentlemen, you are about to witness a cavalcade of atrocities so horrific, I advise the more sensitive members of our audience to leave the premises.Tonight I'm proud to announce the addition of several new monstrosities to the show, including our star attraction, the Beast Boy--an untamed and highly dangerous ghoul who's liable to go nuts and kill us all at the drop of a hat. (impressed "oohs", "ahhs", and "cools" from theAnd now a perennial favorite here at Freakland, ladies and gentlemen. I know you'll all enjoy the musical stylings of Rosie the Pinhead.Puppetteering is an admirable skill in its own right! Give him his due!They're going nuts for you, Beast Boy! You better go out there now!Now that's entertainment.Good work, Eye and Eye.Now bring the Beast Boy to my, uh, den. Ha-ha-ha-ha!Diet soda?Fiddle Faddle? You sure?Torture my greatest creation ever!? Kill the final piece of the puzzle that I've been putting together for years!? Sure, it'd be fun, but I've got a bigger plan, my boy.And when you ripped off that guy's head, I knew it was working like gangbusters!Uh-huh. And then they told two friends, and they told two friends, and so on, and so on. Look at this.Dear Mister Skuggs, I was shocked and disgusted when my grandson told me about the head-popping beast at your show. Please send me six tickets. Dear Beast Boy, I used to like New Kids on The Block, but you're way cuter. My favorite ice cream is chocolate. Is it fun ripping people's heads off? I love you. The Beast Boy is on a blood-letting spree, and Oscar is along for the ride! That one's from Pat Collins!Toad! That Fiddle Faddle is for guests only! You've had enough!Oh, and I suppose Jake and the Fatman is just a fluke?I'll get it.`Yello?Yes... Right... Tomorrow... Mmhmm... Mnunhmm... Wow. Okay. You got it... Hasta la vista to you too. Hahaahahaahaha--Okay, Coogan. I'm finished with you for now.But listen. I may not be "Mr. Tinseltown", but I damn well know what I like. You're gonna be a hideous killing machine, and that's final! Tomorrow night I'll finish the job onstage! And then, to demonstrate your horrible power, you'll slaughter all the old obsolete freaks in cold bl--HEY!I told you enough!Bye-bye. And remember, try another escape, and I'll feed your balls to Toad.That's a lot of milkmen on the same route. No wonder they fight.WOULD YOU TURN DOWN THAT GODDAMN RACKET!?Styrofoam cup?Aaargh! Damn buttered popcorn!Bad for the environment.Nice to see you in the flesh, Laughing Man.Who's the troll?I make freaks alright, but come on, fellas--this thing's pathetic.Not only ugly, he's crazy too.Gentlemen, I'm not going to bullshit you. I know my setup here at Freakland looks like small potatoes.But thanks to your Noxon and my genius, tonight I will turn Ricky Coogan into a freak so hideous, it'll be enough to turn your stomach inside out, boil your brain in its own juice, and cause cold sores you thought had healed up to start buggin' you again. (the EES men shiftIt's really somethin', huh?We'll kick Disney's dead ass!Ha-ha. Gee, I'd love to see your plans.Hey! Hold on!Secretaries? Worker drones? Where's the fun? Where's the spark? Where's the unspeakable evil?This guy's good.And now the moment you've all been waiting for. Ladies and gentlemen, meet the lucky young man who's about to be become the monster with the mostest! Here he is, the Beast Boy!With this remarkable ointment of my own design, I will now turn this half-finished ghoul into the ultimate super freak, dedicated to evil!Uh-oh, that kid looks pissed. EYE AND EYE! KILL HIM!TOAD!Looks like it's time to roll out the big gun. Sayonara, kiddo. Any last words?Suit yourself.Give him the skull cracker, ya big goon!Let's get this over with. Hey Hertz, tell your goons to (he turns to Hertz and isWhat are you saying!?I figured I couldn't trust you corporate greaseballs!Let me proudly introduce the latest in our product line, Noxon 25--now available in a convenient pump!I think it's time EES branched out a little.Now that's a really, really big shoe. Ha-ha-ha-ha! Hmmm, I think I'd like a pair of those!Would you hurry up and waste the troll, please!? I got a lonely shoe over here!Kill him! Kill him!Cut the lovey-dovey bullshit, and start mutilating each other!You think I made you strong? HA! I've cranked my DNA up so high, you won't know what hit you. I'm a wrecking machine! Aaaaaaa!Ow! I think you crushed my spinal cord. I can't feel anything in my fingers.Qait--if you kill me, you'll never find the antidote.A time release serum--I baked it into a delicious batch of macaroons.Come on, Coogan! Come oooon! You haven't got the guts to kill me! Go on! I dare ya'!AAAAAAAARRRRRRGGGGGHHHH!
